ctx: intros m k x Hmap Hsucc m0.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 0 branches.

original: intros m k x Hmap Hsucc m0. unfold nc. simpl. unfold nc in m0. unfold succ in Hsucc. destruct Hsucc as [Hsucc]. destruct (eqc_dec m x (A m k x)) eqn:Heqc. * rewrite <- Heqc. reflexivity. * lia.
